Shivah::

"You're welcome to join us, Shadow Star"said the male "Wait me a nano 
and I'll turn off the door"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Shadow Star: My name is Shadow Star. I serve no less
> than the Inferno himself and the forces of darkness, I
> sense such darkness here and wish to join you.
> 
> --- airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Shivah::
> > 
> > "This is shivah"ansered the male "tell me what're
> > your faction and 
> > intentions!"
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > > He couldn't believe no one had responded. He waved
> > his fingers over 
> > > the Maximal icon he kept from his protoform and it
> > changed to 
> > > Predicon. He sent another message:
> > > 
> > > My name is Shadow Star. I am likely the only hope
> > you have of 
> > winning 
> > > whatever war might be raging on this poor excuse
> > for a plnet.
> > > 
> > > He could tell the evil was comming from a few
> > bots. He hoped that 
> > > meant they were a small faction who would rip
> > their own sparks out 
> > > and lay them at the feet of the Inferno for more
> > power.
> > >

> > > > He transformed into bot mode and approached the
> > base(I'm guessing 
> > > > blackfortress is the one in Europe).

> > > > > He arrived and flew down. He could feel evil
> > in the air. He 
> > knew 
> > > > > inside he would find bots ready to give their
> > sparks to the

> > > > > in a cycle. He sent out a message:
> > > > > 
> > > > > My name is Shadow Star. I wish to join you.
> > > > >

> > > taking.

> > > It 
> > > > > > brings

> > > > > > > > > the question of: What did they do with

> > > > > > > > > Optimus Primal.

> > protoform still sits 
> > there 
> > > > > where 
> > > > > > > the 
> > > > > > > > > Maximals have left it.  Finally,

> > the 
> > > > > > > scanners 
> > > > > > > > go

> > Then from deep in 
> > > the 
> > > > > pit 
> > > > > > a 
> > > > > > > > dark 
> > > > > > > > > force, the Inferno himself arises to
> > claim the body. A 
> > > new 
> > > > > spark 
> > > > > > > > forms

> > > > > > > power 
> > > > > > > > of

> > > > > blood

> > into

> > > > > > > > > handsome, red eyed, muscular bot, of

> > > sense
